title: Chiropractor in Daphne, AL | Back In Motion Chiropractic and Acupuncture
description: Back In Motion Chiropractic and Acupuncture is a skilled Chiropractor in Daphne, AL. Accepting new appointments. Call today or request an appointment on our website.
sitename: Back In Motion Chiropractic and Acupuncture
cleaned_text: Welcome To Back In Motion Chiropractic and Acupuncture Back In Motion Chiropractic and Acupuncture is a skilled and knowledgeable chiropractic office ready to help you achieve a pain-free, healthy lifestyle. Our highly trained staff works closely with our doctors to provide you with a professional and friendly experience. At Back In Motion Chiropractic and Acupuncture, we view our patients as part of our family. We are happy you have chosen us and look forward to meeting you! For more information about our office, don't hesitate to [contact us](/contact/) today at [(251) 621-2224](tel:(251) 621-2224)! DON'T JUST TAKE OUR WORD FOR IT... Testimonials Love Dr Abby!! She is knowledgeable and truly cares for her patients! She listens intently and works thru all your concerns. Dr Ken chose the best in Dr Abby to carry on the legacy of Back In Motion! Amanda B. Couldn't say enough good things about Dr. Parrish at Back in Motion! A couple of years ago I herniated a disc in my back pretty good. I saw a pt first, wasn't completely satisfied, and then found my way to Dr. Parrish. She immediately started diagnosing the issue with great attention to detail and care. Over a period of time the pain was gone, and she had fixed my back. We then went into maintenance mode, and she's taken care of it ever since. Her bedside manner is gentle, and she genuinely cares about you and your health. I highly recommend Dr. Parrish, and certainly glad she is back in our area. G. H. Dr. Abbie is hands down the best chiropractor I've have been to. She is very knowledgeable and listens to complaints about the body. I have recommended her to everyone. Lauren C. Dr. Parrish has been an amazing Doctor to be in the care of. With an extensive base of knowledge and decision making, she helped me start to identify health problems that years of pediatricians and other doctors have glanced over or missed through the years Zach H. This is a great place. They got me in on a Friday when no one else could. I've been see them for over a month now and all my pain has went away. I can't thank them enough. I would recommend them to anyone. Michael T. Dr.Abbie is very friendly and very observant when it comes to your care... I'm very happy to have her as my chiropractor now. Veronica M. Dr.Parrish is kind, smart, and she knows where she's going with your care. Angie H. Dr. Parrish is a wonderful doctor. Her transition from Dr. Ken was seamless. She's been intentional about continuing my treatment, while taking time to assess my needs personally. Her chiropractic skills have kept me feeling well. PLUS!!! She's as sweet as she can be! Pretty cool to have a doctor who cares for the whole person. Christina S. I saw Dr Parrish this past Monday for the first time. She was awesome and does wonders with her chiropractic skills. Ben C. Dr. Parrish is just incredible!! Today was my first visit with her, but it will not be my last. She is professional; yet, she makes you feel right at home. Going back on Monday and I can't wait. I am certain she will get to the bottom of the pain that I am experiencing. Thanks, Dr. Parrish!!! Mary Ann D. About Our Office We offer chiropractic, acupuncture and dry needling services to Daphne, AL, Fairhope, AL, and Spanish Fort, AL. Our mission at Back In Motion Chiropractic and Acupuncture is simply to serve you. We provide excellent chiropractic and acupuncture care to help our patients reach and exceed their health goals. We assess the patient as a whole. We want to address the main concern, but also lead you into a lifestyle of being pain free. We do all of this by offering an evidence-based approach to chiropractic care by utilizing chiropractic manipulation, soft-tissue techniques, therapeutic rehabilitation, and a variety of chiropractic services to help achieve your health goals. Call us today at [(251) 621-2224](tel:(251) 621-2224) to
